attrs.script:
#script

print "Unconfiguring the application"

def unconfigure(api_url):
  r = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user='@@{PRISM_CENTRAL_USER_NAME}@@', passwd='@@{PRISM_CENTRAL_PASSWORD}@@', verify=False)
  if r.status_code == 200:
    return "Application unconfigured"
  elif r.status_code == 412:
    return "Application is not initialized"
  else:
    print "Application unconfiguration failed:", r.content
    exit(1)
    
api_url1 = 'https://@@{address}@@/api/lxci/unmanage/all'

resp = unconfigure(api_url=api_url1)

print resp

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
